author: Brian O'Donovan
title: High alert: A week of warnings in the US
description: Brian O'Donovan reports from Washington as the United States heads towards becoming the new global epicentre of the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
Our phones pinged simultaneously interrupting a Wednesday night binge of a Netflix crime drama.
It was an emergency alert from the Mayor of Washington DC ordering all non-essential businesses close.
It wasn't a great surprise. The neighbouring states of Mar… [+3390 chars]
